name: Aroden
content:
Aroden

The Last Azlanti

Source Pathfinder #100: A Song of Silver pg. 70
Pathfinder Wiki Aroden

Details

Alignment LN
Pantheon Dead Deities
Areas of Concern Humanity, innovation, history, culture, and fulfillment of destiny
Domains Community, Glory, Knowledge, Law, Protection
Subdomains N/A
* Requires the Acolyte of Apocrypha trait.
Favored Weapon Longsword
Symbol An unblinking divine eye balanced between earth and the heavens

On Golarion

Centers of Worship Absalom, Cheliax, Taldor, Sargava, Molthune, Nirmathas, Lastwall, Varisia
Nationality Azlanti

For Followers of Aroden

Magic Items - Sets

Aroden's Array

Traits

Devotee of a Dead God, Faithful Arodenite
